column9: FDA acceptance of sNDA for AXS-05 (Alzheimer's Agitation) with Priority Review accelerates commercial timeline to April 2026, significantly de-risking the asset.
FDA approval of Relacorilant for hypercortisolism solidifies Corcept's endocrinology franchise and removes a major overhang.
Approval of Tradipitant for motion sickness creates a new niche revenue stream, validating the pipeline after previous setbacks.
